title: Client Will Not Update at All on Mac OS X Sierra - Keeps Telling Me to Retry (No Error Message)
body:
Friends, lend me your ears. 

I recently downloaded LoL after getting an iMac that has Mac OS X Sierra installed. To my excitement, the patcher appeared (hooray!) but the client would not update. It kept telling me to retry, and so I would to no avail. I also closed the patcher and started LoL again but still got the same request to retry. Does anyone have a workaround for this? I will be forever grateful. :)

replies.body: Hmmmm this might be happening if Sierra isn't recognizing League as a safe program, so it keeps shutting it down before League can do it's thing. Try adjusting some of your [**Mac Administrator Settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9), and let me know if that helps!

One, POROS ARE AWESOME. 

Two, I went in and checked the contents folder, I just had to go in and check the info screen and it's working now! Thanks for the tips! :)
